mapper.select: select count(1) from np_coupon_no where code_status='1' and coupon_id=#{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select code_id, coupon_id, code_no, couno.customer_id, code_status, code_get_type, code_get_time, code_use_order_id,cu.customer_username from np_coupon_no couno left join np_customer cu on couno.customer_id=cu.customer_id where coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select code_id, coupon_id, code_no, customer_id, code_status, code_get_type, code_get_time, code_use_order_id from np_coupon_no where coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and code_status='0' ORDER BY rand() LIMIT 1

coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update np_coupon_no set coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, code_no = #{codeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, code_status = #{codeStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, code_get_type = #{codeGetType,jdbcType=CHAR}, code_get_time = #{codeGetTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, code_use_order_id = #{codeUseOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where code_id = #{codeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
